name: Walk on Arrow
description:
Walk on Arrow is an innovative hybrid of archery and complete freedom of movement only possible in VR! Hide, trace and fight! Using your bow and arrow to beat all of your opponents and become the one stand at last.

Features: A Whole New Approach to Moving!
You can walk on your arrow! Every time you shoot a hook-claw arrow, your character will move in a tie with the arrow, and you can shoot another hook-claw arrow when you are in the air! Enjoy the fluency and nausea-free moving experience!Unique Weapons
Short Bow, Scatter Bow, Repeating Bow, Sniper Bow, Composite Bow. Choose your favorite bow and shoot your opponent out!Airdrop/Radar
Airdrop/Radar tied with a balloon will appear periodically. You can get powerful weapons from the air-drop. If you stand near the radar for a while, it will burst off an EMP shockwave revealing all other player’s trace.Powerful special arrow
You can get Boom arrow or Frozen arrow from air drop. When Boom arrow landed in the target or ground, it will make a explosion damaging players nearby. When Frozen arrow landed in the target or ground, it will freeze players nearby.Customized your avatar and weapon
Want to become a cool guy? You can wear a leather jacket and a Ray-Ban glasses to become the terminator! Want to become funny? You can wear a hen hat and Koke-Kokko during the game! You can also change your bow, your arrow shaft, and your arrow tail's appearance.Game Mode
Last Man Standing
Deathmatch

Each support up to 10 players play together.
